abstract: College basketball roundup; Virginia men's team beats Virginia Tech, 50-47; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Justin Anderson scored 8 points during a critical 12-0 run to give Virginia a 50-47 victory at Virginia Tech on Sunday and preserve its undefeated record.
snippet: Justin Anderson scored 8 points during a critical 12-0 run to give Virginia a 50-47 victory at Virginia Tech on Sunday and preserve its undefeated record.

keywords.value: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Virginia Surges Past Virginia Tech to Stay Unbeaten
headline.print_headline: Virginia Surges Past Virginia Tech to Stay Unbeaten
